overview: This is what it's all about. Massive slabs of muscular perfection, boiling over with testosterone, unleashed for a face-off in the ring. Match one features French Canadian bodybuilder Justin up against Russian military trained Dolph. Any time you get two bodybuilders in the same room, they try to out macho each other, and these two are no exception. After puffing out their chests, Dolph says he's surprised that Justin even had the balls to show up - and so it begins. Match two features the Can-Am debuts of muscle men, Ken Daniels and Rick. No one would ever describe Rick as small - surely not to his face! - but Ken is simply huge, with muscle upon muscle and rippling tree trunk legs. You would think he'd have the advantage over the leaner Rick. But looks can be deceiving. No matter what, they've both got a nice load ready for you..and you muscle fans should lap this one up!
title: Muscle Match: Volumes 1 & 2
